profile_positions.description: Supporting local authorities in The Netherlands in their endeavours to become climate proof, with a specific focus on heat adaptation (from the angle of health, housing and habitat).
profile_positions.title: Project officer Heat adaptation

profile_positions.description:
ASSIGNMENTS IN 2016

Netherlands Red Cross | Netherlands | Donor reporting
Intermediate and final report writing of a response preparedness programme in Lebanon, South Sudan, Chad, Colombia and Uganda, funded by the Dutch government.

Achmea Foundation | Netherlands | Stakeholder assessment
Assessment of social purpose organisations (charities and social enterprises) as potential strategic partners for Achmea Foundation.

Netherlands Red Cross | Sudan | Field assessment and proposal development
Field assessment coordination (health; WASH; livelihoods; social cohesion) and project proposal development for the EU Trustfund for Stability and Addressing the Root Causes of Irregular Migration and Displaced Persons in Africa, focusing on refugees, IDPs, irregular migrants and host communities in Eastern Sudan, in consortium with a.o. the Sudanese Red Crescent and Danish and Spanish Red Cross.

Netherlands Red Cross | Sudan | Proposal development
Project proposal development (health; WASH; livelihoods; social cohesion) for the Addressing Root Causes Fund of the Dutch government, focusing on refugees, IDPs, irregular migrants and host communities in Sudan, in consortium with the Sudanese Red Crescent and the Danish and Spanish Red Cross.

Achmea Foundation | Netherlands | Assessment
Support to/facilitation of a partner selection process for the Achmea microinsurance programme in Cambodia.

Netherlands Red Cross | Ethiopia | Proposal development 
Project proposal development for EU Trustfund/RESET for Ethiopia, focussing on resilience building and creation of economic opportunities in Ethiopia, in consortium with Cordaid; DORCAS and CIFA (local NGO).
profile_positions.title: Freelance consultant

profile_positions.description:
ASSIGNMENTS IN 2012 - 2014

Netherlands Red Cross | Ethiopia | Proposal development
Project proposal development and facilitation of kick-off workshop for the Chronic Crises project, with a focus on resilience in drought-prone areas. In consortium with Wetlands International and the Red Cross/Red Crescent Climate Centre.

Netherlands Red Cross | Netherlands | Proposal development
Coordination of the application for the call for partnerships of the Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs for chronic crises in the Horn of Africa. In consortium with Wetlands International and the Red Cross/Red Crescent Climate Centre.

Oxfam Novib | Netherlands | Proposal development
Consolidation of a concept note on health sector improvement (sexual and reproductive health) in DR Congo for the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation.

Achmea Foundation | Indonesia | Assessment
Feasibility study for a micro insurance project with the Credit Union and IFC (World Bank) in Kalimantan.

Oxfam Novib | Netherlands | Proposal development
Proposal development for the NSA Call for Proposals of the European Union for Sudan, focussing on enhancing capacities of local development organisations.

Cordaid | DR Congo | Assessment
Feasibility study for the development of a disaster risk reduction programme in North and South Kivu.

French Red Cross | Solomon Islands and Vanuatu | Evaluation and proposal development
Final evaluation and proposal development of an ECHO-funded Community Based Disaster Risk Reduction programme. 

Achmea Foundation | Indonesia | Assessment
Support to the partner selection process for a new microinsurance programme, including a comparative assessment of 15 micro finance institutions.

Achmea Foundation | Indonesia | Proposal development
Project proposal development for Achmea Foundation for micro-insurance.

French Red Cross | Solomon Islands, Vanuatu, Tonga | Evaluation
Final evaluation of an ECHO funded Logistics Capacity Building programme in the Pacific (6 countries).
profile_positions.title: Freelance consultant (continued)

profile_positions.description:
ASSIGNMENTS IN 2015

Netherlands Red Cross | Caribbean | Capacity building (2013-2015)
Capacity building support to the six overseas branches of the Netherlands Red Cross in the Caribbean, including disaster response preparedness and risk reduction, support to elderly and dengue eradication.

Netherlands Red Cross | Netherlands | Proposal development
Project proposal development for the Dutch government to build capacity on response preparedness of the Red Cross societies in Lebanon, Mali, Zambia and Central African Republic. Includes the development of innovative approaches in response preparedness.

Achmea Foundation | Indonesia | Capacity building
Advisor to a micro insurance project in East Java, Indonesia. Co-facilitator in training of local cooperatives (Credit Union).

German Red Cross | Vietnam | Evaluation and capacity building 
Lead consultant in participatory evaluation of Vulnerability and Capacity Assessment (VCA) method used by Vietnam Red Cross. Development of templates and guidance documents to improve analysis and reporting, with a special focus on the inclusion of vulnerable groups (people with disability), climate change adaptation and the effectiveness for local disaster risk reduction planning. Distance-support to the training on and piloting of the developed materials.

Giro 555 | Netherlands | Donor reporting (2012-2015)
Several intermediate and final reports of emergency relief operations of  ±15 collaborating Dutch NGOs (Haiti; Horn of Africa).
profile_positions.title: Freelance consultant (continued)

profile_positions.description:
ASSIGNMENTS IN 2017-2018

UN Women | Vietnam | Study
Lead consultant to identify financing mechanisms for Forecast-based Financing / Early Warning Early Action in Vietnam, for FAO, UN Women and Save the Children.

American Red Cross | Vietnam | Evaluation
Lead consultant to evaluate the ‘Building Resilience to Natural Hazards in Central Vietnam’ project in four provinces in central Vietnam. Funded by USAid/OFDA, in consortium with Plan International, Catholic Relief Service, HelpAge International and Save the Children.

Crime Stoppers International | Netherlands | Proposal development
Development of a project proposal to develop activities of local Crime Stoppers organizations in Central America.

French Red Cross | Vietnam | Evaluation
Lead consultant to evaluate the 'Gender-sensitive Community-based Disaster Risk Management programme' in ethnic minority areas of North-West Vietnam.

Oxfam Novib | Netherlands | Reporting
Compilation of the mid-term report for the Giro555 funded 'Four famines' programme in Niger, Nigeria, Somalia, South Sudan and Yemen.

Netherlands Red Cross | Netherlands | Concept Note, Full proposal, Project start-up
Development of a Concept Note and full proposal submitted to IKEA Foundation, to support the Red Cross National Societies of Ethiopia, Kenya and Uganda in innovative approaches in response preparedness (Forecast-based Financing; Cash Transfer Programming in forecast-based early action and Data Preparedness). Support to the project start-up.

Danish Red Cross | Sudan | Field assessment and proposal development
Technical coordination of a field assessment and formulation of a proposal to strengthen the resilience of local communities to disaster risk, climate change and environmental degradation, in three (northern and Eastern) States of Sudan, to be submitted to the EU Global Climate Change Alliance+ (GCCA+) flagship programme. In consortium with the Danish Red Cross, Netherlands Red Cross, Spanish Red Cross and Swedish Red Cross.
profile_positions.title: Freelance consultant

profile_positions.description:
ASSIGNMENTS IN 2020-2023
Klimaatverbond Nederland (Climate Alliance) | Netherlands | Technical support
Technical support to the climate adaptation team with a focus on heat risks in the Netherlands, related to health, housing, and habitat.

510 - data and digital team of the Netherlands Red Cross | Netherlands | Project coordination 
Coordination of the development of a suite of digital communication tools for Red Cross national societies worldwide.
Coordination of the development and deployment of a package of direct digital aid to undocumented migrants in the Netherlands, consisting of digital cash aid, a web app for information as aid and a WhatsApp helpdesk. Exploring the roll-out of digital aid for migrants in other EU and African countries.

510 - data and digital team of the Netherlands Red Cross | Netherlands | Project development
Promoting remote, digital aid for Red Cross/Red Crescent National Societies to strengthen their COVID operations, including initial scoping of needs and requirements for implementation. 

ASSIGNMENTS IN 2019

Onze Zaak | Netherlands | Operational support
Overall operational support to Onze Zaak, a social enterprise that provides a sheltered workplace to people with disability. 

510 - data and digital team of the Netherlands Red Cross | Netherlands | Team leadership
Support to team leadership (interim Operations Lead) of 510, an initiative of the Netherlands Red Cross with the purpose to improve the speed, quality and cost-effectiveness of humanitarian aid by using and creating data and digital products.

FAO | Vietnam | Process facilitation
Project process documentation and process facilitation to identify lessons learnt of a Forecast-based financing / Early Warning Early Action pilot project in Vietnam, implemented by a consortium of FAO, UN Women and Save the Children.
profile_positions.title: Freelance consultant

profile_positions.description:
Counting Flowers sells high quality scarves from natural materials, hand-made by artisans in developing countries. By purchasing on the basis of Fairtrade principles, we contribute to the income of these artisans. All our profits go to girl education initiatives in countries where education isn’t obvious for everyone. 

https://www.countingflowers.co.uk
https://www.countingflowers.nl
profile_positions.title: Member of the Board
Business Consultant for Achmea CSR program on Micro Insurance

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the disaster management programme in Indonesia, including community based disaster risk reduction/climate adaptation in Nusa Tenggara Timur (rural) and Jakarta (urban). Coordination of ECHO-funded disaster response operations for several earthquakes. Piloting of pro-poor micro finance and micro insurance in Jakarta. Leading consortia with Red Cross, international and local NGOs, and private companies.
profile_positions.title: Disaster Management Programme Manager - Indonesia

profile_positions.description: Project proposal development for DIPECHO, focussing on rural communities to access, understand and utilize climate/weather predictions for disaster risk reduction.
profile_positions.title: Delegate - Mozambique

profile_positions.description: Head of NLRC delegation in Vietnam and Laos. Responsible for all programmes, office, human resources, external communication and donor relations (DIPECHO, DEVCO, corporate donors). Thematic field: disaster management/climate adaptation, WASH, health awareness, livelihoods, capacity building.
profile_positions.title: Country Programme Manager - Vietnam and Laos

profile_positions.description: Piloting the integration of climate change adaptation in disaster preparedness programmes.
profile_positions.title: Disaster Preparedness/Climate Change Delegate - Vietnam
